column2: Administrative Measures Adopted by the Government and the Monetary Board during the Year
“specialised  leasing  company”  means  a  company  registered  under  the  Finance  Leasing  Act,  No.  56  of  2000  to  conduct
“State owned enterprise” means a state owned enterprise of the Government of Sri Lanka of which the share capital over fifty

column1: per centum is owned by the Government of Sri Lanka;

column2: “Sri  Lanka  Development  Bonds”  means  a  debt  instrument  denominated  in  a  foreign  currency  issued  by  the  Public  Debt

column1: Department of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka on behalf of the Government of Sri Lanka.
